info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued August 13 at 2:57AM PDT until August 16 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PDT TUESDAY... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT FOR WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, temperatures 95 to 102 expected. For the Excessive Heat Watch, temperatures 90 to 95 possible. * WHERE...Lower Columbia, including St Helens * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, from 11 AM this morning to 10 PM PDT Tuesday. Excessive Heat Watch is for Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
